name: securethebox-server
description: ``` virtualenv venv virtualenv -p /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.7/bin/python3.7 venv source venv/bin/activate pip freeze > requirements.txt ```

scripts.gcloud: run-s gcloud0 gcloud1 gcloud2 gcloud3 gcloud4
scripts.gcloud0: gcloud config set project "securethebox" ; gcloud config set compute/region "us-west1" ; gcloud config set compute/zone "us-west1-a"
scripts.gcloud1: gcloud beta container --project "securethebox" clusters create "us-west1-a" --zone "us-west1-a" --no-enable-basic-auth --cluster-version "1.12.7-gke.7" --machine-type "n1-standard-1" --image-type "COS" --disk-type "pd-standard" --disk-size "30" --metadata disable-legacy-endpoints=true --scopes "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/devstorage.read_only","https://www.googleapis.com/auth/logging.write","https://www.googleapis.com/auth/monitoring","https://www.googleapis.com/auth/servicecontrol","https://www.googleapis.com/auth/service.management.readonly","https://www.googleapis.com/auth/trace.append" --num-nodes "3" --enable-cloud-logging --enable-cloud-monitoring --enable-ip-alias --network "projects/securethebox/global/networks/default" --subnetwork "projects/securethebox/regions/us-west1/subnetworks/default" --default-max-pods-per-node "9" --addons HorizontalPodAutoscaling,HttpLoadBalancing --enable-autoupgrade --enable-autorepair
scripts.heroku: run-s heroku0 heroku1 heroku2 heroku3 heroku4
scripts.hh: git add . ; git commit -m "+t/-t" ; git push ; git push heroku master
scripts.heroku0: cd /Users/charleschong/go/src/securethebox/securethebox-server ; heroku destroy stb-server --confirm stb-server ; heroku create stb-server ; git push heroku master
scripts.heroku1: heroku ps:scale web=1 ; heroku buildpacks:add https://github.com/ncmd/heroku-buildpack-google-cloud.git -a stb-server
scripts.heroku2: heroku config:set GOOGLE_CREDENTIALS=$(base64 ~/.kube/private.json) PROJECT=securethebox INSTALL_KUBECTL=true ZONE=us-west1-a -a stb-server
scripts.heroku3: if [ -f "./t" ]; then rm -rf ./t ; else touch t ; fi ; git add . ; git commit -m "+t/-t" ; git push heroku master
scripts.heroku4: echo y | heroku ps:exec -a stb-server /bin/echo "test" ; heroku ps:exec -a stb-server /app/vendor/google-cloud-sdk/bin/gcloud container clusters get-credentials "us-west1-a"
